description: Commonly used in electronics prototyping, this solderless breadboard is a small brick of plastic filled with hundreds of holes connected by internal electrical busses.  With a few components and scraps of wire, you could quickly build a circuit on this, if you know what you're doing.
This electrical component is designed to produce microwaves, for use in your microwave.
This is an implement that rectifies the current between AC and DC sources.  Can be fitted to a power cable for connecting appliances and vehicles.

This large device consists mainly of a tube of copper wire surrounding a large copper tube filled with high explosives.  When detonated properly, the explosives allow the device to produce large amounts of electrical energy in a very short time.
